cause.description:
I made this group for other Wiccan/Sorceian believers to come together and make friends with people who follow what they believe without fear of persecution from those who have no idea what we can do and are.
1. Sorcerians Need Unity
2. Anonymous Place For Younger Sorcerians to meet without Parental Interferance
3. Making Friends
cause.mission: Call To Arms Our Socerian Brothers And Sisters
cause.name: Sorcerians Arise To The Call
